title: The Emerald Radiance: Diamond and Emerald Bridal Haaram
materials: 22K Yellow Gold base with Hyderabadi Polish
meticulously set with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Accented with vibrant Emerald gemstones
showcasing excellent clarity and color saturation.
features: A contemporary take on the classic South Indian Haaram. Features a chevron pattern on the top half with intricate diamond settings and emerald accents. The centerpiece pendant showcases a floral motif with delicate diamond work and a central emerald. Suspended droplet elements enhance the necklace's movement and sparkle. Exquisite craftsmanship reflecting the rich heritage of Hyderabad.
colors: Predominantly Yellow Gold and sparkling White Diamonds
beautifully contrasted with lush Green Emeralds.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. A stunning statement piece for the bride (పెళ్లికూతురు)
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The dazzling diamonds and vibrant emeralds create a luxurious and unforgettable look. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans with generations of experience. Makes a cherished heirloom piece, signifying prosperity and good fortune. Its unique design ensures you'll stand out on your special day.
